__e: Wants a meeting with you next week in Tokyo to discuss... the future.
He came to Tokyo? For his father
I was on my way to New York, but I came to Tokyo to speak with the doctor.
You live here in the heart of Tokyo and you say you haven't got any money?
She brought it all the way back from Tokyo... and she wants you to have it.
Then you'll have to go to Tokyo and you'll die with the baby !
